body: Rest in peace commenter you might not be missed.

No matter how bad life gets or how down you feel don't do what the person under me did, as long as your alive there's hope life will get better but once your gone there's no coming back no take backs. idk what happened to the person under me during his life to make him ask for translations or weather or not he was a good person but I hope he is at peace now 😔🙏 rip.
